content.question: Which of the following best explains the reason why African American photographers captured images such as this?

choices.label: African American photographers sought to recreate the segregation of transportation in daily life.
African American photographers sought to challenge the mistreatment of African American citizens.
African Americans studying photography sought to provide visual imagery of experiences during Emancipation.
African Americans studying photography sought to capture image of families being reunited during Reconstruction.

content.answer: African American photographers sought to challenge the mistreatment of African American citizens.
